content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal storage at position (5.5, -57.5)
Consists of a chest at (5.5, -57.5) and inserters at (6.5, -57.5) and (8.5, -57.5)

### Coal mine at position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of a chest at (41.5, -80.5) and inserter at (40.5, -80.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Inserter blocked errors
-  Check if the inserter is blocked by another entity such as a transport belt before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when extracting items from inventory
-  Check if the variable associated with the item to extract is properly assigned before attempting to extract items from the inventory.

### Redundant rotation attempts
- Avoid attempting to rotate an inserter if it is already in the desired orientation.

NAMESPACE
- No new utility functions were defined in this step.
```
